Room.Name: Saint Thenoir's Discount Supplies for Clerics
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a store that sells icons, beads, and other mumbo jumbo supplies.
Room.LongDescription: Of course, the owner doesn't call them mumbo jumbo supplies, but what's the difference? One man's bag of hair and toe nail clippings is another man's eternally blessed gateway to the supreme being he believes is the all-powerful creator. What will you buy?
